column5: For some people, the resources are only good for what they can take from them. It sounds like they identified the jerk. I hope he is charged.
News cast says commercial guys... and this is the reason you have good insurance both personal and marine. Imagine a waterskier hitting that, yikesSent from my iPad using Tapatalk
MAN!! thats just wrong. hitting one of those big tanks at 40 or 50 mph even in a boat could very easily kill someone. burn the people that left that crap on the ice.
They left fingerprints and DNA everywhere...should be able to find them. Put 'em in the cage with Sgt. Voight!
I-O! Just makes you sick to see that lack of appreciation and respect for the environment in general and the resource that we as fisherman love and consider sacred.
Aren't they the same people that enjoy the resource? So next year they want to fish for contaminated food! And have unclean facilities Only in north america

And that"s why I always carry a garbage bag when I go fishing,soft or hard water. Frustrating that a few of our fellow sportsmen paint this picture of the rest of us, but I try to do my best to clean up after them, like my mother did for me when I was a child. Trash left in the outdoors reflects on all of us.
Filthy pigs! Hire a haz mat team to clean it up and make the slobs pay for it!
This is very sad. And now all of us are in the same group

I'm not good at posting pics so I'll just post a link to a Lake Simcoe website. Turns out it was a hut operator and his apology is in the post thread. http://www.lakesimcoemessageboard.co...c,21126.0.html
